boardgame.name: Omen: A Reign of War
boardgame.description: You could be the greatest warlord the isles have ever seen. Your thirst for power is matched only by your strategic wit and cunning. You know no rival, aside from your brother._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;As sons of Zeus, you stand poised to conquer all of Greece, but not without the blessing of the gods. To determine who shall rule the domain of man, the gods have devised a contest and lent their most powerful forces for the cause: pillage and raze three cities. When the carnage ends, only one brother will be victorious, while the other will fade into antiquity as just another half-god spawn of Zeus._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;To compete in this contest, players will take on the role of one of these two brothers with access to a powerful array of units including soldiers, beasts, and oracles; each with various uses. Soldiers are powerful, and affect the city they are played in. Beasts are easily double the strength of the average soldier, but occupy two slots in the player's available army, and may be discarded to access powerful special abilities. The oracles offer passive boons to the player, but leave a lot to be desired in strength._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Omen: A Reign of War is a two-player card game by Small Box Games and features two distinct game modes: standard and draft. The standard game has players drawing cards from a collective deck, and accessing cards from a collective discard pile. The draft game allows players access to their favorite units, with each player drafting his own deck to play the game with._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;................................................................._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Omen: A Reign of War has seen several different editions and expansions since its initial 2011 release. It is in its current and final edition, the Omega Edition; a streamlined edition incorporating almost all of the previously released content, plus additional new content, for Omen. It will be the format of the game for any future printings._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Omen: A Reign of War - Omega Edition Contents:_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; 66 Unit Cards_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; 12 Feat Cards_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; 12 Reward Cards_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; 6 Relic Cards_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; 6 Challenge Cards_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; 5 Whim Cards_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; 3 City Cards_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; 2 Reference Cards_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; 20 Coin Markers_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;.................................................................._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Omen editions/releases:_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; 1st Edition (2011) - 24 Units, with multiple copies of each unit, 12 Feats and 12 Reward Cards. Wood Composite Coins._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Shattered Aegis Expansion (2011) - Introduced 16 new units._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; 2nd Edition (2012) - Included all units from the 1st edition, plus the units from the Shattered Aegis expansion, plus 10 additional units._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Forgotten Oath Expansion (2012) - Introduced 6 Champions. Also included rules for 3-4 players which were not included in later editions of Omen._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Relics of Olympus (2013) - Introduced 6 Relic cards._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Echoes of Myth (2013) - Introduced Spirit and Hero Cards, which were new versions of the previous Champions, and introduced rules for playing with only 1 of each Unit card._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Olympus Edition (2013) - Limited Edition with black linen box and metal coins. Included 1 copy of each previously released Unit card._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Omega Edition Deluxe (2015) - Limited Edition Kickstarter exclusive. Black linen box and metal coins. (Same card content as the Olympus Edition) _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

Supporters at this level receive One (1) copy of the new version of Omen: A Reign of War and one (1) copy of any any Achieved Feat bonuses made available through this Kickstarter campaign. Buyer pays US Potal shipping(insurance required). Will only ship to residential address.

I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;m an avid game collector in a smoke-free home and take good care of my games. Unless otherwise noted above, game is complete with little or no shelf wear or damaged components. High-resolution picture available upon request. Domestic US shipping is $7 (insurance is optional if you want to pay for it). International shipping will be actual price plus USD$5.00 (sorry, it is a much bigger hassle on my end, plus I need to provide the box). Contact me if you have any questions about shipping. Must pay me via PayPal (I will cover the fees). I have many other games up for sale and in most cases I can combine shipping for some significant savings, but please check with me and provide your zip code for details.

For sale is a copy of the latest Olympus Edition, complete with all original components, and played with gently only once (and not using all the cards). Short of a _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;CSI_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;-grade inspection, there is no detectable wear on the components. I am the original owner of the game. I purchased it recently, but found that my primary gaming partner wasn_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;t as crazy about it as I was, so I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;m selling it in as new condition as possible. At least we both agree that the artwork is beautiful. As the game is published by Small Box Games, the box is small and fits nicely inside the smallest USPS flat rate box. Hence, I expect that the shipping cost will be around $5.00, but I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;ll provide an exact price once I know the destination ZIP code. In addition (and preferable) to PayPal, I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;m willing to accept payment via Google Wallet or Simple Instant transfer.

This is for the English Second Edition, from the KICKSTARTER campaign! Opened and partially sleeved but unplayed. It includes: - The Base Game - The Shattered Aegis Expansion (incorporated into 2E) - The Forgotten Oath expansion (Kickstarter exclusive!)(NIS) - Echoes of Myth Expansion (NIS) - More than enough of the custom sleeves (add-on from the Kickstarter campaign) to sleeve everything.Five packs to be precise, but I sleeved some cards already and have 3.5 packs not yet in use. I sleeved the Reward cards in clear FFG sleeves since they have different backs. - 60 of the KS exclusive metal coins with the owl back (that_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s 20 more than backers for for free. I paid extra for more! They_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;re also great to use with Cyclades.) - Custom box that holds everything. Check out my other items in the Marketplace. (I also have Hemloch, another game by Small Box Games.) I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;ll entertain reasonable offers for multiple purchases and combine shipping!

Omen a Reign of War is my absolute favorite game of all time! I literally keep a back up copy of this game just in case anything were to happen to my main copy of Omen. However, I ordered an extra copy to give away as a gift, so I have 3 total copies of the game, and I think its time to part ways with 1 of those! This includes a good to very good (depending on how picky you are) condition copy of Omen a Reign of War Olympus Edition (from Kickstarter). Games sold typically have a tracking label and are dropped off at FedEx in less than 24 hours from when payment is received. We work super fast to ensure you get your games in no time flat. Shipping is a flat $7 for continental US addresses. This includes tracking and insurance. We ship via FedEx Ground from sweet home Alabama. (I can probably also put this in a padded mailing envelope and ship via USPS Priority Mail for the same price, which normally only takes 2-3 days transit if you would prefer a faster option, but in a padded envelope instead of a box). Paypal is our preferred method of payment, however if you would like to ship outside of the US or want to use a separate payment method, simply drop us a private message for more information. We typically respond to messages in an hour or less.
